attributes.action: say no to the EU in all aspects.  Leave the EU now.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With the EU membership we have already allowed uncontrollable immigration, stupid laws regarding religion, health and safety...
Sign this petition to put a stop to the "United States Of Europe" that is looming.  50 PMs fought for our freedoms.  Millions of troops from our armed forces died to protect Great Britain, now Tony Blair seeks to usurp it all and sell us out to the EU.  This is Britain, we are British.  Support you country!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
